name: ccm-components
tagline: Components of the Clientside Component Model (ccm)
body:
### Welcome to ccm-components pages.
ccm is a client side component model. The client is the browser, which loads web components on demand from any -maybe cross domain- servers. Every web component consists of CSS, JavaScript and JSON files. JavaScript is used to render HTML into div-s and span-s. No iFrames are used.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
